body.title: Using the Granite IT Maven Plugin

section.name: Basic POM
section.p: The following example represents the minimum necessary configuration to add integration test functionality to your content-package artifact.
section.source:
<project> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<groupId>org.example</groupId> <artifactId>example-ui</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
<!-- be sure to specify the packaging type as 'content-package-it' --> <packaging>content-package-it</packaging>
<build>
<plugins> <!-- enable extensions on both the content-package-maven-plugin and the graniteit-maven-plugin to activate the content-package-it enhanced packaging lifecycle --> <plugin> <groupId>com.day.jcr.vault</groupId> <artifactId>content-package-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.0.20</version> <extensions>true</extensions> </plugin>
<plugin> <groupId>net.adamcin</groupId> <artifactId>graniteit-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.8.0</version> <extensions>true</extensions> </plugin>
</plugins> </build> </project>
